short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays live weather and video feed from coasts in southern california. Useful for surfers,scuba divers, and maritime folk alike!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upon clicking the popup button, there will be live video feed of several coastal ares in southern California such as Santa Monica, Catalina kelp forests, and Huntington pier. Weather data retrieved from an api will be displayed under each video. The only functionality occurs within the popup. This is useful because it makes checking surfing and snorkeling conditions easier than looking at weather data from external sites or apps. Your solution is a single click away!
